title: Windows SuperAIO v5 181-in-1 en-US DaRT7-8.1 - murphy78
description:
This will **NOT** fit on a DVDR
Use a 32GB+ Blu-Ray or an 32GB+ USB flash drive.

No Windows Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Registry Settings were modified.
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO.

*NOTICE* - This SuperAIO uses a script to install Windows
versions. Don't download if you only wish to use the default
Windows Setup program or are intending to upgrade an existing
system with this release. Neither are available.

murphy78 presents Windows Super AIO v5 181-in-1
All install indexes are directly from the microsoft files.
The only indexes that were modified were ProWMC to set-edition

Run Patch file: SuperAIO-v5.exe
Size: 576 KB
SHA-1: 3E095ABA61A12041F82C99EF7101DCEEE7030CCC

Point it at folder containing file:
Win7-2008r2-8-2012-81-2012r2-SuperAIO-en-US-v4.iso
Size: 27.8 GB
SHA-1: CF306DE3773A94FD1F2A7C3FBA31047277C2376F

To create Release File:
Win7-2008r2-8-2012-81-2012r2-SuperAIO-en-US-v5.iso
Size: 27.8 GB
SHA-1: 05AD34905859B3A85B9E3E139DB8D958396B75A3

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
7z sfx builder 2.1
murphy78 DiskPart and Apply Image Script 1.2.4
oscdimg for ISO mastering - udfver102 -pEF and -p0

*INSTRUCTIONS*
1- Get the SuperAIO v4 iso: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10096049" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10096049</a>
2- Run exe.
3- Point exe to the folder containing the v4 superaio
4- Let the sfx/smartversion script create the v5 iso
5- Verify sha-1 hash of v5 iso and delete old v4.

It's so easy, a baby could do it.

Changes:
-Fixed a small but critical error where DISKMENU loop was preventing
DISK number from being changed. (It still doesn't mention the disk
number immediately after changing it, but as long as it doesn't show
an error when changing, consider it successful. It will show the
selected disk number on the main menu as usual.)

Credits: murphy78

Enjoy,
murphy78-TPB/MDL :)
